Concept/77

UAE, 2016

Concept/77

Concept/77 is a symphony of architecture, light, and space. The structure is designed to explore the duality of illumination and shadow, seamlessly blending geometry with natural elements.

Inspired by nature and minimalism, the design focuses on evoking a sense of tranquility and reflection. From conceptual drawings to lifelike renderings, each step is a testament to the pursuit of perfection.
